In England, in the seven days to 13 July, there were 224,385 new confirmed cases (398.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 July, there were 170,422 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 32% (53,963 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 18 July is 4,735,387 (8,412.9 cases per 100,000 population).
